primary_changes: Added color-coded disagreement highlighting for grid cells
Implemented CellDetailPopup for displaying disagreement details
Enhanced GridVisualization and RegionVisualization with disagreement indicators
Added severity-based color system for disagreements

patterns_discovered: Color-coded severity system for model disagreements
Dynamic disagreement highlighting across different visualization modes
gotchas_discovered: Need to handle multiple disagreement types
Complexity of mapping disagreements across different grid representations
Managing state for cell detail popups
recommendations: Consider extracting disagreement handling logic into a separate service
Add unit tests for disagreement detection and severity calculation
Implement accessibility features for disagreement highlighting
Consider performance optimization for large grids with many disagreements
